description: A whole-of-government approach has seen decisive measures being rolled outÂ in Singapore. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: How Singapore is stemming the spread of the coronavirus
title_page: How Singapore is stemming the spread of the coronavirus | The Straits Times
maintext:
At 7am on the cold, wintry morning of Jan 30, a Singapore Scoot flight left Wuhan city in China.
On board the Boeing 787 to Singapore were 92 Singaporeans, the crew, and several Ministry of Foreign Affairs consular officers.
